overview: In Europe several several centuries ago, a group of prisoners about to be executed are freed as part of the celebration of the upcoming marriage of the emperor's daughter, Princess Gilda, to a very rich prince from another country.  Sid Caesar composed the song "Clothes Make the Man".  Ran 93 minutes on German TV.
tagline: Cannon Movie Tales:Lavish, Feature length new versions of the world's best loved storybook classics.
title: The Emperor's New Clothes
